metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Superglobals were introduced in PHP 4.1.0, and are built-in variables that are always available in all scopes.
content.html: Superglobals were introduced in PHP 4.1.0, and are built-in variables that are always available in all scopes.

content.text: Some predefined variables in PHP are "superglobals", which means that they are always accessible, regardless of scope - and you can access them from any function, class or file without having to do anything special.
content.html: Some predefined variables in PHP are "superglobals", which means that they are always accessible, regardless of scope - and you can access them from any function, class or file without having to do anything special.

content.text: The next chapters will explain some of the superglobals, and the rest will be explained in later chapters.
content.html: The next chapters will explain some of the superglobals, and the rest will be explained in later chapters.
